titleStmt.title: The good of early obedience, or, The advantage of bearing the yoke of Christ betimes discovered in part, in two anniversary sermons, one whereof was preached on May-day, 1681, and the other on the same day in the year 1682, and afterwards inlarged, and now published for common benefit / by Matthew Mead.
titleStmt.author: Mead, Matthew, 1630?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
